properties.name: addText
properties.description: text inside button that adds additional fields
properties.rawdescription: text inside button that adds additional fields

properties.name: optional
properties.description: If provided with true value, generated field will not be required.
properties.rawdescription: If provided with true value, generated field will not be required.

properties.name: tooltip
properties.description: if provided, blue information icon will be rendered with onHover tooltip
properties.rawdescription: if provided, blue information icon will be rendered with onHover tooltip
